name: div
features: Enhanced Mobility: Spandex fabric added for unrestricted ease of movement
Moisture-Wicking: Anti-microbial, moisture-management material keeps players dry & comfortable
Impact Protection: Quilted sponge side panels provide extra padding where it’s needed most
Secure Fit: Elastic stretch waistband with sublimated Marucci logos ensures a snug, athletic fit
Added Safety: Includes protective cup for complete lower-body protection
Durable Construction: 82% polyester / 11% spandex / 7% sponge padding for comfort & performance
